Title: Kryss Solid Wood Coffee Table In Provincial Teak Finish
Description: Woodsworth is our premium homegrown label thats part classic, part contemporary. A delectable amalgamation of the timeless and trendy, a precarious balance of function and flair. Woodsworth is a harmonious fit for all tastes, styles and spaces. Coffee Tables are low tables used in living room spaces placed in the centre of seating furniture. Used for drinks, flowers, and is a general table for placing items.  Furniture bought on Pepperfry.com comes with a 3 Year Warranty against any manufacturing defects. So go ahead and buy with confidence.
